name: Letter [S]wap
description:
Letter [S]wap is a very short and confusing first-person video game.

Your friend sends you a letter: he needs help and asks if you could meet him.

You arrive at the place only to encounter the absence not only of your friend, but also the management.

Look around for the sender.

Controls:
WASD\ZQSD - move
Mouse - look around
Right mouse button - interact
Tab - current task

https://www.patreon.com/reludum
